outline:
1. sacred place, sanctuary, holy place
    1. sanctuary
      1. of the temple
      2. of the tabernacle
      3. of Ezekiel's temple
      4. of Jehovah
kjv_def: chapel, hallowed part, holy place, sanctuary.
strongs_def: a consecrated thing or place, especially, a palace, sanctuary (whether of Jehovah or of idols) or asylum
